column1: It’s caused deaths in tests. It has to be closely supervised. It’s a bust for Covid. Sorry. (I have articles frm 3 other countries). FDA warns against using hydroxychloroquine for coronavirus outside of hospitals https://www.nbcnews.com/health/health-news/fda-cautions-against-hydroxychloroquine-outside-hospital-setting-n1191266 via @nbcnews
